003892BF.desc:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:19}|%|]{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} A vine creeper periodically emerges from the ground every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds and applies {c_number}{dot:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{buffduration:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} seconds to an enemy in the area.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Vines strangle all surrounding enemies, Immobilizing them for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_STRANGLE}{/c} seconds and poisoning them for {c_number}{dot:ACTIVE_POISON}{/c} damage over {c_number}{buffduration:ACTIVE_POISON}{/c} seconds.

1394CF37.Mod4_Description: {c_important}Vine Creeper's{/c} Immobilize duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} second.

74D6BC35.Mod2_Description: {c_important}Vine Creeper's{/c} active Poisoning duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.

C435C5B6.Mod3_Description: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%+|]{/c} against enemies strangled by {c_important}Vine Creeper{/c}.
